EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring Days_Q217.1 New York Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at Spring Days New York
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.springdays.io]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow at Spring Days New York. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springdays@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springdays@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Spring Days - New York
June 20th 8:00am: Doors Open 8:00am-8:45am: Breakfast/ Registration 9:00am-1:00pm: Sessions 1:00pm-2:00pm: Lunch 2:00pm-5:00pm: Open Space 5:00pm: Networking & Social @ Carmine's Restaurant <[[http://www.carminesnyc.com/locations/times-square]]>
June 21st 8:00am: Doors Open 8:00am-8:45am: Breakfast/ Registration 9:00am-1:00pm: Sessions 1:00pm-2:00pm: Lunch
2:00pm-4:00pm: Open Space 5:00pm: Wrap-up
See the full Spring Days - New York Agenda here <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/new-york]]>. Location 11 Times Square, 7th Floor (Between 41st & 42nd Streets on 8th Ave) New York, NY 10036
Directions From LaGuardia Airport (8.9 mi, 16 min driving, 34 min w/traffic): • Bear right onto Marine Terminal • Turn left onto Ditmars Boulevard • Turn right onto Grand Central Parkway • Take ramp left for Brooklyn Queens Expressway E toward Staten Island • Take ramp and follow signs for I-278 West • At exit 35W, take ramp right for I-495 West toward Manhattan / Midtown Tunnel • Toll road • Take ramp toward Downtown / 35 St / 34 St • Keep straight onto Queens Midtown Tunnel Exit / Tunnel Exit Street • Turn right onto E 34th Street • Road name changes to W 34th St • Turn right onto 8th Avenue • Turn right onto W 42nd Street • Arrive at 11 Times Square. Entrance to Spring Days on 8th Ave between 41st & 42nd
We look forward to seeing you! The Spring Days Team
